languages.text: "Заодно угроза взрыва поможет загнать непокорную живую десятину на баржи. Некоторые рекруты не в себе, но бомбы быстро приведут их в чувство".

traits.locale_text: "Заодно угроза взрыва поможет загнать непокорную живую десятину на баржи. Некоторые рекруты не в себе, но бомбы быстро приведут их в чувство".

languages.text: "At the same time, the threat of an explosion will help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will soon bring them to their senses."
languages.original_text: "Заодно угроза взрыва поможет загнать непокорную живую десятину на баржи. Некоторые рекруты не в себе, но бомбы быстро приведут их в чувство".

traits.locale_text: "At the same time, the threat of an explosion will help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will quickly bring them to their senses."
"It seems that the explosive threat should also drive the unruly living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits are unsettled, but the bombs will set them straight in no time."

"At the same time, the threat of an explosion will help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will soon bring them to their senses."

"At the same time, the threat of an explosion will help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will soon bring them to their senses."

"The threat of a possible detonation should also help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will set them straight."

"The threat of a possible detonation should also help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will set them straight."

"The threat of a possible detonation should also help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will set them straight."

"At the same time, the threat of an explosion will help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will quickly bring them to their senses."

languages.text: «Al mismo tiempo, la amenza de una explosión también debería ayudar a transportar al diezmo viviente a las naves, por indisciplinado que sea. Algunos reclutas no se mostrarán muy cooperativos ahora, pero en cuanto sepan lo de las bombas entrarán en razón».
languages.original_text: "At the same time, the threat of an explosion will help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will soon bring them to their senses."

traits.locale_text: «Al mismo tiempo, la amenza de una explosión también debería ayudar a transportar al diezmo viviente a las naves, por indisciplinado que sea. Algunos reclutas no se mostrarán muy cooperativos ahora, pero en cuanto sepan lo de las bombas entrarán en razón».

languages.text: “此外，炸弹就埋在所有人脚下，这应该可以把那些不守纪律的卫队士兵赶到船上。有些新兵可能一开始不太合作，但只要告诉他们炸弹的事情，他们的脑子马上就会清醒。”
languages.original_text: "At the same time, the threat of an explosion will help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will soon bring them to their senses."

traits.locale_text: “此外，炸弹就埋在所有人脚下，这应该可以把那些不守纪律的卫队士兵赶到船上。有些新兵可能一开始不太合作，但只要告诉他们炸弹的事情，他们的脑子马上就会清醒。”

languages.text: 「爆発の可能性による脅威は、統制されていない生きている租税を荷船の上に集めるのにも役立っている。新兵の一部は決して協力的ではないが、爆弾について彼らに教えれば考えを正すだろう」
languages.original_text: "The threat of a possible detonation should also help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will set them straight."

traits.locale_text: 「爆発の可能性による脅威は、統制されていない生きている租税を荷船の上に集めるのにも役立っている。新兵の一部は決して協力的ではないが、爆弾について彼らに教えれば考えを正すだろう」

languages.text: « En même temps, la menace d'une éventuelle explosion devrait contribuer à convaincre les membres les plus rétifs de la dîme vivante de monter à bord des barges. Si certaines recrues refusent pour l'heure de coopérer, la découverte de l'existence de ces bombes suffira à les faire rentrer dans le rang. »
languages.original_text: "At the same time, the threat of an explosion will help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will soon bring them to their senses."

traits.locale_text: « En même temps, la menace d'une éventuelle explosion devrait contribuer à convaincre les membres les plus rétifs de la dîme vivante de monter à bord des barges. Si certaines recrues refusent pour l'heure de coopérer, la découverte de l'existence de ces bombes suffira à les faire rentrer dans le rang. »

languages.text: "Aynı zamanda bir patlama tehdidi, disiplinsiz canlı aşarı mavnalara sürmeye de yardımcı olacaktır. Acemilerin bir kısmı şu an iş birliğine pek yanaşmıyor olabilir ama bombalardan söz ettiğimizde hizaya geleceklerdir."
languages.original_text: "At the same time, the threat of an explosion will help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will soon bring them to their senses."

traits.locale_text: "Aynı zamanda bir patlama tehdidi, disiplinsiz canlı aşarı mavnalara sürmeye de yardımcı olacaktır. Acemilerin bir kısmı şu an iş birliğine pek yanaşmıyor olabilir ama bombalardan söz ettiğimizde hizaya geleceklerdir."

languages.text: "Gleichzeitig wird eine drohende Explosion helfen, den undisziplinierten lebenden Zehnt auf die Lastschiffe zu treiben. Einige der Rekruten werden wohl nicht sonderlich kooperativ sein, aber das Wissen um die Bomben wird sie rasch zur Vernunft bringen."
languages.original_text: "At the same time, the threat of an explosion will help to herd the undisciplined living tithe onto the barges. Some of the recruits may be less than cooperative now, but telling them about the bombs will soon bring them to their senses."

traits.locale_text: "Gleichzeitig wird eine drohende Explosion helfen, den undisziplinierten lebenden Zehnt auf die Lastschiffe zu treiben. Einige der Rekruten werden wohl nicht sonderlich kooperativ sein, aber das Wissen um die Bomben wird sie rasch zur Vernunft bringen."
